I can assist with crime reporting, criminal tracking, providing feedback, and user support.
Available services include reporting crimes, searching for criminals, and answering your questions.
You can register by providing your details on the Sign-Up page.
Head to the registration page to create an account.
You can report a crime via the 'Report Crime' section.
Provide details of the incident on the crime report form.
Navigate to the 'Crime Reports' section to view submitted reports.
You can check crime data under the reports menu.
Use the 'Search Criminals' option to locate suspects.
Enter details to search for criminal records.
You can submit your feedback in the 'Feedback' section.
We'd love to hear from you! Use the feedback form to share your thoughts.

patterns: Can you help me with something?
responses: Sure, feel free to ask!
What do you need help with?

patterns: How to track a criminal's location?
responses: We use secure methods to track locations based on available data.
Location tracking can be initiated via authorized personnel.
Criminal identification is done using facial recognition and evidence analysis.
Provide details to assist in suspect identification.

patterns: How can I contribute to the community?
responses: You can contribute by reporting crimes and providing feedback.
Support us by spreading awareness and sharing your insights.
